    Tools used↑

    Ruby

    • All code used to generate this website is available at bartoszwais.github.io. For business logic scripts check its tools section.
    • Static part of website is built using Jekyll, jekyllrb.com.

    JavaScript

    • JavaScript is needed as second step to visualize order of products for storing and displaying purposes.
    • jQuery library is used as helper and search functionality necessity.
